  23. class Image(File):
  24. SIDEBAR_IMAGE_WIDTH = 210
  25. DEFAULT_THUMBNAILS = {

  53. @classmethod
  54. def matches_file_type(cls, iname, ifile, request):
  55. # This was originally in admin/clipboardadmin.py it was inside of a try
  56. # except, I have moved it here outside of a try except because I can't
  57. # figure out just what kind of exception this could generate... all it was
  58. # doing for me was obscuring errors...
  59. # --Dave Butler <croepha@gmail.com>
  60. iext = os.path.splitext(iname)[1].lower()
  61. return iext in ['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png', '.gif']
  63. def save(self, *args, **kwargs):
  64. if self.date_taken is None:
  65. try:
  66. exif_date = self.exif.get('DateTimeOriginal', None)
  67. if exif_date is not None:
  68. d, t = str.split(exif_date.values)
  69. year, month, day = d.split(':')
  70. hour, minute, second = t.split(':')
  71. self.date_taken = datetime(
  72. int(year), int(month), int(day),
  73. int(hour), int(minute), int(second))
  74. except:
  75. pass
  76. if self.date_taken is None:
  77. self.date_taken = datetime.now()
  78. self.has_all_mandatory_data = self._check_validity()
  79. try:
  80. # do this more efficient somehow?
  81. self.file.seek(0)
  82. self._width, self._height = PILImage.open(self.file).size
  83. except Exception:
  84. # probably the image is missing. nevermind.
  85. pass
  86. super(Image, self).save(*args, **kwargs)
  88. def _check_validity(self):
  89. if not self.name:
  90. return False
  91. return True
  93. def sidebar_image_ratio(self):
  94. if self.width:
  95. return float(self.width) / float(self.SIDEBAR_IMAGE_WIDTH)
  96. else:
  97. return 1.0
  99. def _get_exif(self):
  100. if hasattr(self, '_exif_cache'):
  101. return self._exif_cache
  102. else:
  103. if self.file:
  104. self._exif_cache = get_exif_for_file(self.file.path)
  105. else:
  106. self._exif_cache = {}
  107. return self._exif_cache
  108. exif = property(_get_exif)
  110. def has_edit_permission(self, request):
  111. return self.has_generic_permission(request, 'edit')
  113. def has_read_permission(self, request):
  114. return self.has_generic_permission(request, 'read')
  116. def has_add_children_permission(self, request):
  117. return self.has_generic_permission(request, 'add_children')
  119. def has_generic_permission(self, request, permission_type):
  120. """
  121. Return true if the current user has permission on this
  122. image. Return the string 'ALL' if the user has all rights.
  123. """
  124. user = request.user
  125. if not user.is_authenticated() or not user.is_staff:
  126. return False
  127. elif user.is_superuser:
  128. return True
  129. elif user == self.owner:
  130. return True
  131. elif self.folder:
  132. return self.folder.has_generic_permission(request, permission_type)
  133. else:
  134. return False

  138. if self.name in ['', None]:
  139. return self.original_filename or 'unnamed file'
  140. else:
  141. return self.name
  143. @property

  151. @property
  152. def icons(self):
  153. _icons = {}
  154. for size in filer_settings.FILER_ADMIN_ICON_SIZES:
  155. try:
  156. thumbnail_options = {
  157. 'size': (int(size), int(size)),
  158. 'crop': True,
  159. 'upscale': True,
  160. 'subject_location': self.subject_location}
  161. thumb = self.file.get_thumbnail(thumbnail_options)
  162. _icons[size] = thumb.url
  163. except Exception, e:
  164. # catch exception and manage it. We can re-raise it for debugging
  165. # purposes and/or just logging it, provided user configured
  166. # proper logging configuration
  167. if filer_settings.FILER_ENABLE_LOGGING:
  168. logger.error('Error while generating icons: %s',e)
  169. if filer_settings.FILER_DEBUG:
  170. raise e
  171. return _icons
  173. @property
  174. def thumbnails(self):
  175. _thumbnails = {}
  176. for name, opts in Image.DEFAULT_THUMBNAILS.items():
  177. try:
  178. opts.update({'subject_location': self.subject_location})
  179. thumb = self.file.get_thumbnail(opts)
  180. _thumbnails[name] = thumb.url
  181. except Exception,e:
  182. # catch exception and manage it. We can re-raise it for debugging
  183. # purposes and/or just logging it, provided user configured
  184. # proper logging configuration
  185. if filer_settings.FILER_ENABLE_LOGGING:
  186. logger.error('Error while generating thumbnail: %s',e)
  187. if filer_settings.FILER_DEBUG:
  188. raise e
  189. return _thumbnails
  191. @property
